name: Adobe
notes:
Click the setup link and sign in with your email address and password, then click Add in the Passkeys section and follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then click "Sign in with passkey" when you sign back in to use your passkey.

name: Air New Zealand
notes: Passkey upgrade will be offered after creating an account or signing in.

name: Air New Zealand
notes: Passkey upgrade will be offered after creating an account or signing in.

name: Air New Zealand (Australia)
notes: Passkey upgrade will be offered after creating an account or signing in.

name: Amazon UK
notes:
Amazon is actively rolling out sign in with passkey support. Setting up a passkey on Amazon needs to meet one of the minimum software requirements of iOS 16, macOS Big Sur, or Android 9 (if applicable).

#### To set up a passkey on your Amazon account:

1. In Your Account, select Login & Security.
2. Select Set up next to Passkey.
3. Select Set up.
4. Follow the instructions provided to complete setting up a passkey.

Signing in to different Amazon marketplaces (Amazon.co.uk compared to Amazon.com for example) requires either a new passkey for that specific marketplace or using your Amazon password.

name: Amazon
notes:
Amazon is actively rolling out sign in with passkey support. Setting up a passkey on Amazon needs to meet one of the minimum software requirements of iOS 16, macOS Big Sur, or Android 9 (if applicable).

#### To set up a passkey on your Amazon account:

1. In Your Account, select Login & Security.
2. Select Set up next to Passkey.
3. Select Set up.
4. Follow the instructions provided to complete setting up a passkey.

Signing in to different Amazon marketplaces (Amazon.co.uk compared to Amazon.com for example) requires either a new passkey for that specific marketplace or using your Amazon password.

name: Apple
notes:
Passkeys for Apple accounts are automatically generated by any Apple devices signed in to an Apple ID running iOS 17 or macOS Sonoma or newer. You will then be able to sign in with passkeys on Apple using any iOS device or Mac signed in to the same Apple ID you are signing in to.

If you are using a different browser or device, such as a Windows PC or Mac signed in with a different Apple ID, you can scan the QR code using your iOS device and sign in with passkeys on Apple.

You are not yet able to save passkeys for Apple ID accounts in third-party credential managers and can only be stored in iCloud Passwords at this time.

name: Arpari
notes: Powered by Passage by 1Password.

name: Best Buy
notes:
Use the setup link provided and sign in with your email address and password, then follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then choose Sign In with a Passkey when you sign back in to use your passkey.

name: Chek
notes: Powered by Passage by 1Password.

name: Cloze
notes:
### To add a passkey to your account

From the side menu bar:
1. Select (••• more)
2. Select, settings
3. Expand 'your account' and select [Add] passkeys

name: CVS
notes:
Register individual passkeys using iOS, with Safari or Edge browsers.

Please note: Saving and signing in with passkeys on CVS is currently incompatible with 1Password in the browser and third-party passkey managers on iOS.

name: Discord
notes:
### How to setup passkey

Goto settings > My Account

### Available on:
Web, desktop app and on iOS.

name: Discourse
notes: Passkeys can be setup within members account preferences > security

name: DocuSign
notes:
Click the setup link and sign in with your email address and password, then follow the steps to set up passwordless login using biometrics to create a passkey. 

Sign out, then sign back in with your email address and choose Log in Without Password to use your passkey.

name: eBay
notes:
Select the setup link above and sign in with your email address and password, then select "Turn on" next to "Passkeys" or "Face/fingerprint/PIN sign in" section and follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then sign back in. 1Password will sign in with your passkey automatically.

name: Finom
notes:
To setup a passkey: 

Settings -> Security -> Passkeys

name: FormX.ai
notes: Uses AuthGear. Setup on register or at https://auth.formextractorai.com/settings

name: FreePrints
notes:
Only available within app. 

Passkey is offered when signing up instead of password prompt. Also available in settings > Personal Information, tap "Save a passkey".

name: GitHub
notes:
#### To save a passkey on your GitHub account
1. Navigate to your GitHub account's security settings by heading to https://github.com/settings/security or selecting the setup link above.
2. Select "Add a passkey" under "Passkeys."
3. Select "Add passkey" and follow the on-screen instructions to save a passkey to your GitHub account.

Once added, you will be able to sign in to your GitHub account by selecting "Sign in with a passkey" on the sign in page.

#### Blog post:

https://github.blog/2023-09-21-passkeys-are-generally-available/

name: Google
notes:
Visit setup link and sign in to a personal Google account with your email address and password, then follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then sign back in. You may need to click "Try another way" to see the option to use your passkey.

name: haeppie
notes: Passkeys offered after sign up or sign in, after verifying email address.

name: Hancock
notes: During logon and account setup, passkeys are presented as an option. If you decide not to set up passkeys at that time, you will be prompted to set them up during application use. Should you choose not to do so, or if you want to manage your passkeys, you can go to your user profile to perform these tasks

name: Home Depot
notes: Home Depot may ask you to set up a new passkey on each new device or browser when signing in to your Home Depot account.

name: World of Hyatt
notes: Hyatt.com will require verification via an emailed code in order to create or manage passkeys.

name: Instacart
notes:
New users signing up in the Instacart app will be asked to set up a passkey. Existing users or new users signing up through a web browser are not yet able to add a passkey to their accounts.

If you are an Instacart shopper, you are able to add a passkey to your existing account through the Shopper app.

#### To set up a passkey on your Shopper account:

Step 1: Go to the Account tab in the Shopper app.

Step 2: Tap Settings.

Step 3: Tap Set up passkey.

name: KAYAK
notes:
From the setup link, click "Sign in" > "Continue with email" to create a new account with a passkey.

Sign out, then repeat the same process to sign in with your passkey.

name: Klemn
notes:
To add to your account go to _"Paramètres > Sécurité > Ajouter une clé d'accès"_.

To log in with a passkey, simply click _"Utiliser une clé d'accès"_ on the login screen.

name: Link by Stripe
notes: Link by Stripe offers a quick checkout solution, ensuring the secure storage of credit card information. By default, it sends 2FA codes to the customer's phone number.  However, users also have the option to create passkeys, either after signing in or from the user account menu when they are logged in.

name: LinkedIn
notes: Linkedin is actively rolling out support for saving and signing in with passkeys on Linkedin accounts. Not all accounts have access to saving and signing in with passkeys yet whilst Linkedin rolls this out.

name: Microsoft (Personal)
notes:
Click the setup link and sign in with your email address and password, then click "Add a new way to sign in or verify", choose Use your Windows PC, and follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then choose "Sign in with Windows Hello or a security key" when you sign back in to use your passkey.

Not available using Safari right now and passkeys cannot be added to Microsoft 365 Business or Education accounts at this time.

name: Nvidia
notes:
Click the setup link and sign in with your email address and password, then choose Hardware Security Device, click Add New Security Device, and follow the steps to create a passkey.

Sign out, then choose "Log In With Security Device" at the bottom of the page when you sign back in to use your passkey.

name: omg.lol
notes: Powered by Passage by 1Password.

name: OneLogin
notes: Passkeys Support can be enabled by an Administrator of a OneLogin environment by enabling the Webauthn authentication factor on a User Security policy which is then allocated to either a group of users or all users in the environment.

name: OnlyFans
notes: Setup 'passwordless login' through Account Settings.

name: Descope passkeys demo
notes: Passkeys demo powered by descope

name: PayFit
notes: PayFit do not explicitly call setting up 'biometric authentication' option as a passkey or use terminology/iconography from the FIDO passkey guidelines but these are passkeys.

name: PayPal
notes:
Passkeys on PayPal can only be created on mobile devices in Chrome on Android or iOS, and in Safari on iOS. Signing in with passkeys is not yet available on Google Chrome (and other Chromium browsers) on desktop.

#### To set up a passkey on your PayPal account:
1. On your mobile device, navigate to PayPal's settings > Security or use the setup link above.
2.  Select "Passkeys."
3. Select "Create a passkey."
4. Follow the instructions provided to complete setting up a passkey.

### Confirmed Location Support
- [United States](https://newsroom.paypal-corp.com/2022-10-24-PayPal-Introduces-More-Secure-Payments-with-Passkeys)
- Canada
- [United Kingdom](https://newsroom.uk.paypal-corp.com/2023-06-27-PayPal-Expands-Passkeys-to-the-UK)
- [Germany](https://newsroom.deatch.paypal-corp.com/PayPal-weitet-Passkeys-nach-Deutschland-aus)

name: rad.dad
notes: Powered by Passage by 1Password.

name: Robinhood
notes: Select Account → Menu → Security and Privacy → Create passkey → Continue

name: Roblox
notes:
### Setting up passkeys: 

- Navigate to Settings on your iOS app or web browser. Log in if prompted.
*Note: Android support will be coming soon*
- Under Account Info > Login Methods > Passkeys, press the “Add passkey” button.
- Note: You may need to verify your identity with your password or a one-time code sent to your email.

To complete adding a passkey, you will be asked to unlock your device.


### Manage your passkeys

Go to Settings on your iOS app or web browser. Login to your account if prompted.

*Note: Android support will be coming soon*
- Under Account Info > Login Methods > Passkeys, press the “Manage” button.
- Press the trashcan icon next to the passkey you want to remove.
- You may be asked to verify your identity using passwords or an email one-time code.

name: Shakepay
notes:
#### To set up a passkey on your Shakepay account:

1. In the Shakepay app, enter the settings page by clicking the gear icon or selecting the setup link above.
2. Select ‘Security & privacy’
3. Select ‘Passkeys’
4. Select ‘Add new passkey’ and follow the on-screen instructions.

name: Shopify
notes:
Sign in to Shopify with your email address and password, then follow the steps in the documentation link above to create a passkey. 

Sign out, then sign back in with your email address and choose "Log in with passkey" to use your passkey.

name: Tailscale
notes: Saving and signing in with passkeys on Tailscale is limited to new user accounts only.  Users also cannot create a new tailnet using passkey key authentication. The tailnet must first be created using a different authentication method then invited users can use passkey authentication for their accounts.

name: Tender
notes: Tender only supports passkeys for authentication

name: TikTok
notes:
TikTok is rolling out passkeys for iOS to users and requires the following criteria to be met:
- Have an Apple device running iOS 16 or macOS Ventura or later.
- iCloud Keychain must be turned on in your Apple device settings.
- Two-factor authentication must be turned on for your Apple ID.

#### To set up a passkey on your TikTok account:

1. In the TikTok app, tap Profile at the bottom.
2. Tap the Menu button at the top.
3. Tap Settings and privacy.
4. Tap Account.
5. Tap iCloud passkey, then tap Set up on the next screen and follow the instructions provided to complete setup.

name: Trusona Authentication Cloud
notes: Requires a commercial license. Contact Trusona at info@trusona.com for more information.

name: Trustworthy
notes: Available on iOS after signing up / signing in.

name: vk
notes: VK.com / VK.ru provide passkey sign in using their 'OnePass' ID. A phone number or email address is required to create a passkey.

name: Voura
notes:
When signing up for Voura, you will be automatically prompted to save a passkey for your account.

Powered by Passage by 1Password.

name: WhatsApp (Android beta)
notes:
Available only to WhatsApp (beta) for Android

https://www.androidpolice.com/passkey-support-whatsapp-goes-live-beta-channel

name: X (formerly Twitter)
notes:
X (formerly Twitter) is rolling out signing in with passkeys support to existing US-based accounts on iOS. No other platforms or locations are able to save a passkey to their accounts at this time.

**To set up a passkey on your X account:**
1. Log in to the X app with the account you wish to enable passkey for.
2. Select Your account in the navigation bar.
3. Select Settings and privacy, select Security and account access, then Security.
4. Under Additional password protection, select Passkey.
5. Enter your password when prompted.
6. Select Add a passkey and follow the on-screen prompts.

name: Yahoo! JAPAN
notes: https://fidoalliance.org/yahoo-japan-announces-support-for-passkeys-across-available-platforms/

name: Yahoo!
notes: Passkeys can be setup after signing in from a mobile device.

name: Zoho
notes: Recently updated this listing to include passkey support for signing in, in addition to MFA.
